title: 【矮人工作室】【1.3.2】【ssp】thor Mod-雷神之锤有木有~

txt_content:
本帖最后由 路邊電燈泡 于 2012-10-9 21:05 编辑 



斗篷：


图太大挤压一下





由於作者太屌，我們矮人工作室的人都看不懂作者的意思...

懂的人看下...：
Standed cape you get it is on all the time i will add a option to turn it of.
 
Donator cape if you make a video or donate to me you get this cape. If you would like to donate msg me.
 
 
 
接着搬运....
